General.Name: Harmonychain AS
General.Description: Harmonychain AS, provides software and hardware solution for crypto industry. It develops artificial intelligence (AI) and scrypt algorithm application specific integrated circuit (ASIC) supercomputer microchip; and smart power supply unit. The company offers Scrypt-pool, a mining software and cryptocurrency IPR. It also develops data center. The company was incorporated in 2017 and is headquartered in Oslo, Norway.
